pageContext.claim: “So now it is reported that, after destroying his life & the life of his wonderful family (and many others also), the FBI, working in conjunction with the Justice Department, has 'lost' the records of General Michael Flynn. How convenient. I am strongly considering a Full Pardon!”
pageContext.analysis: The Post reported,"It is unclear what records Trump was referencing when he alleged that the Justice Department had “lost” material related to the case."
